import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import Slider from'react-slick';import'./slider.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SliderComponent=()=>{const[banners,setBanners]=useState([]);const sliderRef=useRef(null);const settings={dots:false,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,arrows:false};const handleNext=()=>sliderRef.current.slickNext();const handlePrev=()=>sliderRef.current.slickPrev();useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://demo.thewondermom.com/back-end/core/api/banners/')// Replace with your API URL
.then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setBanners(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching slider data:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{ref:sliderRef,...settings,children:banners.map(banner=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:banner.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:banner.image,alt:"Test"})})}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev-button",onClick:handlePrev,"aria-label":"Previous slide"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next-button",onClick:handleNext,"aria-label":"Next slide"})]});};export default SliderComponent;
